articles.author: The42 Team
articles.title: Five Irish players nominated for European Rugby Player of Year - The42
articles.description: Caelan Doris, Jimmy O’Brien, Josh van der Flier, Michael Lowry and Jack O’Donoghue have made the longlist.
articles.content:
FIVE IRISH PLAYERS have been selected on the longlist for the 2022 EPCR European Player of the Year.
Leinsters Caelan Doris, Jimmy OBrien and Josh van der Flier, Ulsters Michael Lowry and Munsters J… [+1417 chars]
